casebody.data:
Lotus SMITH, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
HENRY FORD HEALTH SYSTEM, Nassar Beydoun, M.D., and Gina Fundaro, M.D., Defendants,
and
Karmanos Cancer Center and Zeynep Yilmaz-Saab, M.D., Defendants-Appellants. SC: 155679
COA: 335910 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's July 13, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously.

WILDER , J., did not participate because he was on the Court of Appeals panel.
